id: getparticipantsforcctransaction

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Retrieve the conversation participants."}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/vcc/{region}/chat/v2/tenant/{tenant-id}/conversations/{conversation-id}/participants"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves all the participants that joined during the lifespan of the conversation.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"region","in":"path","description":"Business region to use [e.g., us, eu, ca, ap]","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","enum":["us","eu","ca","ap"],"example":"us","default":"us"}},{"name":"tenant-id","in":"path","description":"Tenant ID.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"string"},"example":"TheTenant"},{"name":"conversation-id","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Conversation identifier.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"string","example":"125"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
